query: SELECT s.id, s.status, s.startedAt, s.completedAt, s.errorMessage, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM scanResults WHERE scanId = s.id) as resultCount FROM scans s ORDER BY s.id DESC LIMIT 3
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3gaYF7se9kVaEXG.b9054b9f64d3 --database N26k37rfuZW3JrMwUJG4CN --execute SELECT s.id, s.status, s.startedAt, s.completedAt, s.errorMessage, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM scanResults WHERE scanId = s.id) as resultCount FROM scans s ORDER BY s.id DESC LIMIT 3
